Name: Dawn of Light
About the game: Student game of the outgoing promotion of objectif 3D. Dawn of Light is a first person shooter, the protagonist is the deity of darkness who, after centuries wakes up in an unrecognizable desert world. Many enemies will try to block your way and send you back to your sleep... permanently. Discover what woke you up. Climb the obstacles and collect your powers to destroy any mortal who dares to stand in your way. Collect their souls after destroying their physical bodies to fuel your powers. Embody the evil necessary to save this ruined world.
